metadata.title: CVE-2018-1054 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds memory read flaw was found in the way 389-ds-base handled certain LDAP search filters, affecting all versions including 1.4.x. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could potentially use this flaw to make ns-slapd crash via a specially crafted LDAP request, thus resulting in denial of service.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.1.5-1').
